summary: This document is a financial alert from Deutsche Bank regarding Richard Kahn, who has been flagged for critical risk due to a regulatory action involving disciplinary measures by the NYSE Arca. The alert details Kahn's failure to provide testimony as requested by FINRA, resulting in a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless compliance is met.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as an individual who has been subjected to regulatory action by the NYSE Arca for failing to provide requested testimony.

events.title: Regulatory Action by NYSE Arca
events.description: Richard Kahn and other respondents were found to have violated NYSE Arca Equities Rule 10.2(d) by not providing testimony as requested by FINRA, leading to a permanent bar from NYSE Arca membership unless compliance is achieved.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn is flagged for critical risk by Deutsche Bank due to a regulatory action.
Kahn was involved in a disciplinary action by the NYSE Arca for failing to provide testimony.
The decision from NYSE Arca permanently bars Kahn from membership unless he complies with the testimony requirement.
The regulatory action occurred on April 20, 2012.
The alert was added to monitoring on August 17, 2018.
